title: datalad.support.tests.test_annexrepo failures on real win10/conda
body:
The appveyor environment is supercharged in many ways. Here is a glimpse of reality starting from https://github.com/datalad-handbook/book/issues/132:

```
> python -m nose datalad.support.tests.test_annexrepo
======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.support.tests.test_annexrepo.test_AnnexRepo_addurl_to_file_batched
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\mih\Miniconda3\lib\site-packages\nose\case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "c:\users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 434, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (d,)), **kw)
  File "c:\users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 546, in newfunc
    return tfunc(*(args + (path, url)), **kwargs)
  File "c:\users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 607, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "c:\users\mih\code\datalad\datalad\support\tests\test_annexrepo.py", line 982, in test_AnnexRepo_addurl_to_file_batched
    eq_(info['size'], 14)
```
